knimeNode.name: Facebook Insights Query (P&G)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Retrieves insight metrics from Facebook Graph API.

fullDescription.intro: Retrieves insight metrics from Facebook Graph API. Available metrics are listed at: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.2/insights/. Metrics are grouped into like metrics by dimensions (i.e. "by gender and age"). Node supports up to 4 groups of metrics.
fullDescription.option: Comma-separated list of Facebook metrics. See above reference link for options.

Time span for metrics to cover when aggregated. Some metrics are not available for all time periods (e.g. page_fans is only available for Lifetime). Review insights reference link above for valid periods. When in doubt choose "All".
Starting date (PST) for metric collection. Remove this constraint with the "Use Since Date" checkbox.
Ending date (PST) for metric collection. Remove this constraint with the "Use Until Date" checkbox.

ports.inPort: Authenticated connection to Facebook API with selected Object ID
ports.outPort: Table containing first group of metrics
Table containing second group of metrics
Table containing third group of metrics
Table containing fourth group of metrics
